userStories.title: Read build extraction schema and analyze HTML structure
acceptanceCriteria: Read schema/build_extraction_schema.json to understand required output format
Analyze sample HTML files from scraped_builds/gateway_classic_cars/html/
Identify HTML patterns for: year, make, model, price, mileage, VIN, engine, transmission
Document HTML selectors and patterns for extraction
userStories.notes: Gateway Classic Cars uses JSON-LD structured data in <script type='application/ld+json'> tags. Extract from JSON-LD for best reliability.

userStories.title: Create build extraction script for Gateway Classic Cars
acceptanceCriteria: Create Python script that reads all HTML files from scraped_builds/gateway_classic_cars/html/
Extract build data from JSON-LD structured data
Generate build_id using scripts/ralph/build_id_generator.py
Set source_type to 'listing' (dealer inventory)
Infer build_type from year/make/model context (Restomod, Classic, Hot Rod, etc.)
Extract sale_data: price_numeric, listing_price, mileage, vin, status, location
Output to scraped_builds/gateway_classic_cars/builds.json
Include all required fields: build_id, source_type, build_type, build_source, source_url, year, make, model
userStories.notes: Created extract_gateway_builds.py with JSON-LD parsing, build_type inference, and sale_data extraction.

userStories.title: Execute build extraction for all vehicles
acceptanceCriteria: Run the extraction script against all 2,823 HTML files
Generate builds.json with all extracted build records
Log extraction summary with counts
Validate output matches schema requirements
userStories.notes: Extracted 2,822 builds (1 file had no JSON-LD data). Output: scraped_builds/gateway_classic_cars/builds.json

userStories.title: Verify build extraction and update pipeline
acceptanceCriteria: Verify builds.json contains 2,823 build records
Validate required fields are present for all builds
Update sources.json: set pipeline.builds = 2823
Append learnings to progress.txt
Commit changes: feat: BUILD-004 - Extract all builds from Gateway Classic Cars
userStories.notes: Verified 2,822 builds extracted. Updated sources.json pipeline.builds = 2822. Ready for Stage 4 (Mod Extraction).
